Bash(git -C "D:\\backcoin\\Aplicativos\\backchain" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(BackchainGovernance\): make timelock irreversible, restrict executeDirectly \(C-04/C-05\)

Remove setTimelockEnabled\(\) â€” timelock now activates irreversibly via
advancePhase\(\) when reaching Timelock phase. Replace all timelockEnabled

Bash(git -C "D:\\backcoin\\Aplicativos\\backchain" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(NFTLiquidityPool\): propagate MiningManager call failures \(C-06\)

Replace silent try/catch in _sendTaxToMining and _sendETHToMining with
direct calls that propagate reverts. Prevents BKC being sent to
MiningManager without distribution accounting, and ETH being silently
stuck in pool contract. Add MiningManagerCallFailed error and require
miningManager != address\(0\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

fix\(NFTLiquidityPool\): remove unsafe unchecked arithmetic blocks \(C-07\)

Remove unchecked blocks from price/tax calculations in _executeBuy and
sellNFT where price * taxBips could overflow. Also remove unchecked from
pool balance/count updates and stats tracking in addBKCLiquidity,
addMoreNFTsToPool, removeBKCLiquidity. View functions getBuyPriceWithTax
and getSellPriceAfterTax also use checked math now.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
